sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Box,Typography,useTheme,useMediaQuery } from '@mui/material'

function loginPage() {
  const theme = useTheme()
  const isNoneMobileScreens = useMediaQuery("(min-width:1000px)")

  const alt = theme.palette.background.alt;

  return (
    <Box >
      <Box display={"flex"} width={"100%"}  background={alt} p="1rem 6%"  justifyContent={"center"} >
        <Typography
            fontWeight="bold"
            fontSize="32px"
            color="primary"
          >
            Sociopedia
          </Typography>
        </Box>
        <Box background={alt} width={isNoneMobileScreens ? "50%":"93%"}>
        <Typography
            fontWeight="500"
            variant='h5'
            mb="1.5rem"
          >
            Sociopedia
          </Typography>
        </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default loginPage
